0.question_text: Welcome to campus! How do you greet the first fellow '25er that you see to make that great first impression?

A.answer_text: Enthusiastically wave! Until you realize that they were just waving goodbye to their parents… oops

B.answer_text: Reenact the mating dance of the blue-footed boobies

C.answer_text: Claim to be a huge fan of The Office

D.answer_text: Pitch them my startup idea: you can never start networking too early

E.answer_text: I don't. I wait for them to greet me.

1.question_text: So… what have you been up to this past year?

C.answer_text: Slowly but surely succumbing to the TikTok algorithm

D.answer_text: I uploaded a single video of my college acceptance reactions on YouTube to launch my vlogging career and then never uploaded again

E.answer_text: What have I been up to this past year? What has anyone been up to this past year? What does the passage of time truly mean to anyone? Does time exist? Do I exist?

2.question_text: What will you miss the most about online school?

A.answer_text: Waking up approximately 18 seconds before class, joining the meeting, then falling back asleep

B.answer_text: Pretending like everyone is about the same height as you

C.answer_text: The little adrenaline rush of pooping during class and not double checking if you're on mute

D.answer_text: Sending a meme during class and watching your friend suppress a laugh

E.answer_text: The ability to press Leave Meeting to escape any awkward interaction

3.question_text: What were you most looking forward to in person?

A.answer_text: Sporting the 48 new fits I bought online over the past year

C.answer_text: Charging tourists $30 for an $18 swipe into Annenberg #entrepreneurship

D.answer_text: Swiping my CVS Extra Care Card like the strong, independent college student that I am

E.answer_text: Making meaningful, genuine connections with people on LinkedIn I mean in real life

4.question_text: What do you think of the food so far?

B.answer_text: I have been guzzling oat milk and for some reason I cannot stop

C.answer_text: Idk who Red is but this isn’t giving "best"

D.answer_text: There are about 12 variations of chicken in sauce

5.question_text: Pick a way to spend your first Harvard weekend.

A.answer_text: Imagining unrealistically attractive bottom halves of people’s faces underneath their masks

B.answer_text: Joking about pissing on the John Harvard statue but never actually doing it

C.answer_text: Solidifying your course schedule for the next seven semesters

D.answer_text: Passing a single raspberry White Claw around in Straus common room

E.answer_text: I’M STILL UNPACKING DON'T RUSH ME

6.question_text: Which Harvard building do you resonate with the most?

A.answer_text: Lamont Library: Business on the top, party on the bottom ;)

C.answer_text: Cabot Library: beep boop beep boop

D.answer_text: SEC: New, fresh, and emotionally distant

E.answer_text: The Dudley Co-Op: I’m lost, send help

7.question_text: Give another definition for Primal Scream:

A.answer_text: Learning that a $40 billion endowment doesn’t give you air conditioning

B.answer_text: A beloved Harvard tradition where athletes on scooters trap Larry Bacow in a circle and scoot around him until he screams in frustration

C.answer_text: Uhhh... that one painting with the long face Voldemort dude?

D.answer_text: The sound of despair that first-years in Canaday make after seeing their living quarters for the first time

E.answer_text: The Memorial Church bells going BRONGLONGDONGODNGLONG

8.question_text: What at Harvard are you the most scared of?

A.answer_text: Walking into Annenberg during peak meal hours and not recognizing anyone at any of the tables

C.answer_text: EXPOS 20: An intensive seminar that aims to improve each student’s ability to discover and reason about evidence through the medium of essays.

D.answer_text: Getting run over by an athlete scootering through Harvard Yard at 30mph

E.answer_text: Realizing that you have run out of fun facts and may, in fact, not be that fun

9.question_text: Which Harvard tradition are you the most excited for?

A.answer_text: Primal Scream: The mask stays ON

B.answer_text: Harvard-Yale: The only time it’s acceptable to show school spirit

C.answer_text: Yardfest: I wonder which C-list artist will headline this year

E.answer_text: River Run: She’s a runner she’s a track star, she gon’ run away the Quad is too far
